title: Refactored deleting fields context menu overridden by message dialog
description: While using JUnit on LinuxMotif and Windows 2000:
OB: When attempting to delete a field, the expected context menu for deletion is not displayed. Instead, a prompt immediately asks if I want to delete the getter/setter along with the field.
EB: Expected behavior: Display the context menu for field deletion without an immediate prompt to delete associated getters/setters.
SR:
1. Open JUnit.
2. Attempt to delete a field.
3. Notice the absence of the context menu and the immediate prompt regarding deletion of associated getters/setters.
